channel.title: MoparScape didn't start the Flame War
channel.description:
I finally decided to do a remake after about a year now since the last one. [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8ndCioPA3O4]Click Me to Watch[/url]
[b]Things I have fixed[/b]
[ul][li]Transition Between Posts[/li] [li]Quality of the Video[/li] [li]Properly added Credentials[/li][/ul]
Will post a link for download if needed.
Thanks to The Soul for helping me with a few things.

item.title: MoparScape didn't start the Flame War

item.title: MoparScape didn't start the Flame War
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Aeolian, post:62, topic:372490”]I wasn’t even aware I was in this rofl.

Proof I’m Jeff for people who will say “You’re a fake.”

BbixB.png1366×768

Being a long time member on this site, I still come to appreciate the humor.[/quote]
Do we care?

item.title: MoparScape didn't start the Flame War
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:49, topic:372490”][quote author=ollie123 link=topic=468544.msg3428120#msg3428120 date=1292108555]

because i don’t capitalize and use punctuation i don’t speak english well? hm, ok.

I’ll put it simple. I’m the last person you want to pick a fight with, because it’s impossible to beat me. Just drop it and move on. Thanks.
[/quote]sorry. i wish i was as cool and tough as you… darn
your nothing special dude, jump off a bridge… into a lake

So you want him to jump off a bridge into a bed of water which will absorb all of the energy? Wow dude, you’re smart. Actually that sounds like fun.

Your clearly a moron, the surface tension of the water, if strong enough, would kill him instantly.

surely not if he did a pencil dive

A pencil dive on to a water bed would surely kill you[/quote]

what if the bridge was really low

Read full topic
